data.message: People are so salty about his Trump beef. It’s not the first time he’s dissed a politician and/or fans.

replies.message: People are salty because his songs suck balls. Get it?
Danny Goodlet oh, I had no idea.
Jerson René Sarceno It was a joke. Salty, like balls. Nevermind.

Right lol, the irony. T supporters call Liberals snowflakes but then they can't handle Eminem. Call him a hater but they keep bringing their salty flakes here. It's like they are the clingy ex's . Em knows who their true supporters are and not just bandwagon people who get butthurt.
Itzel Perez Did you like the song where he raped his own mother?

He told his fans who supported a particular political figure to go fuck themselves? News to me.

I'm all ears if you have proof of that.
Lance Van Dyke all lives matter unless you you intend to attempt to end someone else's....

Michael Curatolo all you have to do is YouTube his bet award freestyle.
The whole thing is about trump.
Well the shit is over and people need to stop egging it on and move on because at the end of the day, Eminem is not gonna change his thoughts and views.
Yep. But it's the first time he said fuck you to his fans.

Michael Curatolo He literally told his fans "fuck you" if you are a Trump supporter. I'm admittedly paraphrasing, because I'm not a nerd that remembers the lyrics he put out on a cypher a month ago, but that's pretty much what he said.

Eminem has literally been saying fuck you among other things to his fans since the beginning. I have no idea what you guys are talking about, but evenin The Way I Am. I mean shit just listen to the Marshall Mathers LP. See the problem here is most people started listening to Eminem after recovery, but regardless this dood been telling his fans to fuck off for years. AND he's been saying things against what he feels is corrupt government for years to, people act like it's a new thing. "Fuck money, I don't rap for dead presidents, I'd rather see the presidents dead" Eminem said that himself over 10 years ago. Plus with songs like Mosh White America etc. he was against corruption or what he felt was corruption and he still is against that. Not much has changed for Em and anybody who's
Listened to his whole discography would know that
He's lost over a million followers and counting.
Now he's only got 89 + million followers...poor EM
Mine has more to do with MGK.
